body_html:
Finally, I was able to compile tensorflow on CPU with AVX512 (without AVX512 support) using gcc 4.8!
Unfortunately, now I get the following warning from tensorflow:

2017-09-13 21:45:51.237971: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:137] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
body_text:
Finally, I was able to compile tensorflow on CPU with AVX512 (without AVX512 support) using gcc 4.8!
Unfortunately, now I get the following warning from tensorflow:
2017-09-13 21:45:51.237971: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:137] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
body:
Finally, I was able to compile tensorflow on CPU with AVX512 (without AVX512 support) using gcc 4.8!
Unfortunately, now I get the following warning from tensorflow:

`2017-09-13 21:45:51.237971: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:137] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: AVX512F
`
